live_events.query: Find all endpoints related to live events and in-play betting

findings.details: You will get a token from our support or Orders page. you should pass it as token= in GET query.
API endpoint is started with https://api.b365api.com/
Events API is aggregated from Bet365 (main source) and others. It keeps history data (since Sep 2016).

prematch_odds.query: Find all endpoints related to prematch odds and upcoming events

findings.details: You will get a token from our support or Orders page. you should pass it as token= in GET query.
API endpoint is started with https://api.b365api.com/
Events API is aggregated from Bet365 (main source) and others. It keeps history data (since Sep 2016).
use Bet365 Upcoming Events to get the id (which is FI)

authentication.query: Find all information about authentication, API tokens, and rate limits

findings.details: You will get a token from our support or Orders page. you should pass it as token= in GET query.
API endpoint is started with https://api.b365api.com/
Events API is aggregated from Bet365 (main source) and others. It keeps history data (since Sep 2016).
It only include 1-3 main markets for each sports. If you need all odds markets, you should use Bet365/Bwin/Betfair API instead.
